footer.description: Specializing in professional architectural visualization and developing innovative digital solutions for engineers and engineering firms. We strive to provide the best services and products that help in developing engineering work.

hero.description: Specializing in professional architectural visualization and developing innovative digital solutions and applications serving engineers and engineering firms.

preview.title: Architectural Visualization Services
preview.subtitle: We provide professional architectural visualization services for engineering firms and architectural offices

page.hero_desc: We provide professional architectural visualization services for engineering firms and architectural offices using the latest technologies.
page.cta_desc: Contact us now to get a customized quote for your project

exterior.title: Exterior Visualization
exterior.desc: High-quality design for building facades and architectural projects

interior.title: Interior Visualization
interior.desc: Designing interior spaces with precise details and realistic lighting

animation.title: Video Animation
animation.desc: High-quality animated videos for architectural projects

preview.title: Apps & Digital Solutions
preview.subtitle: Innovative applications helping engineers and designers in their daily work

page.hero_desc: Innovative applications designed to facilitate engineering work and protect digital content

engineer_system.title: Engineer System
engineer_system.desc: Integrated application for engineering project management and accounting
engineer_system.long_desc: A comprehensive system helping engineers manage their projects, calculate quantities, track progress, and document work professionally.
engineer_system.long_desc_detail: The Engineer System is a comprehensive tool designed specifically for engineers and engineering firms. It helps you manage your projects, calculate quantities, track progress, and document work professionally. An easy-to-use interface with advanced features to meet your daily needs.

file_encryption.title: File Encryption
file_encryption.desc: Application for encrypting and protecting files, videos, and courses
file_encryption.long_desc: Strong protection for your files and educational courses from copying and piracy using the latest encryption technologies.
file_encryption.long_desc_detail: File Encryption and Protection application provides strong protection for your digital files and educational courses from copying and piracy. It uses the latest encryption technologies to ensure the security of your content with ease of use and license management.

features_detail.1: Protect videos from recording and copying

preview.title: Free Tools & Apps
preview.subtitle: A collection of free tools and applications designed to help users in their daily work

page.hero_desc: A collection of free tools and applications designed to help you in your daily work

kh_tools.title: KH Tools
kh_tools.desc: Free Blender addon facilitating architectural visualization
kh_tools.long_desc: A set of free tools for Blender that facilitate architectural visualization and save time and effort in scene setup.
kh_tools.long_desc_detail: KH Tools is a set of free tools for Blender designed to facilitate and speed up the architectural visualization process. It contains various tools for scene setup, material application, and lighting adjustment with a single button click.

quran_app.title: Quran App
quran_app.desc: Free mobile application for reading and reciting the Holy Quran
quran_app.long_desc: A free application for reading and reciting the Holy Quran with an easy-to-use interface and multiple features.
quran_app.long_desc_detail: A comprehensive free application for reading the Holy Quran with an easy-to-use interface. It contains the full Quran with the ability to listen to recitations by various readers, in addition to search and bookmark features.

task_manager.title: Task Manager
task_manager.desc: Free application to organize and manage your daily tasks
task_manager.long_desc: A simple and effective application to organize and manage your daily tasks and track your achievements.
task_manager.long_desc_detail: A simple and effective application for managing your daily tasks. It helps you organize your work, set priorities, and track your achievements in an easy and flexible way.

page.hero_desc: Learn architectural visualization and modern technologies through comprehensive practical courses

blender.title: Blender for ArchViz Course
blender.desc: Learn professional architectural visualization using Blender from scratch to mastery. High-quality recorded videos you can watch anytime.
blender.long_desc: A comprehensive and integrated course to learn architectural visualization using the free Blender software. Takes you from beginner to professional level through detailed explanation and practical applications on real projects. The course consists of high-quality recorded videos you can watch anytime and anywhere.
